content: Warning, I was sobbing by the end. This is Lizzie Palmer, a 15 year old, who put this on YouTube...there were 3,000,000 hits as of this morning. I hope this is OK to post and if it is not I know the Mods will let me know. "http://www.youtube.com/v/ervaMPt4Ha0&autoplay=1" I hope I did that right This message has been edited.
